description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. A small weapon research facility, located on a small island, have had an unusual outbreak. As a former S.E.E.D scientist you have been sent in to deal with it.  * Platforming Action * Two Endings * Unique Flower Planting System * New Ninja Mode * No Continues
description.short: A small weapon research facility, located on a small island, have had an unusual outbreak. As a former S.E.E.D scientist you have been sent in to deal with it.  * Platforming Action * Two Endings * Unique Flower Planting System * New Ninja Mode * No Continues
